spirit:component.spirit:name: logisdhc

spirit:modelParameter.spirit:name: C_REGS_INTERFACE
spirit:modelParameter.spirit:displayName: Use OPB, SPLB or AXI4-Lite to access logiSDHC registers

spirit:modelParameter.spirit:name: C_REGS_BASEADDR
spirit:modelParameter.spirit:description: Registers base address - use only if OPB or SPLB bus interface is implemented.

spirit:modelParameter.spirit:name: C_REGS_HIGHADDR
spirit:modelParameter.spirit:description: Registers high address - use only if OPB or SPLB bus interface is implemented.

spirit:modelParameter.spirit:name: C_SPLB_NUM_MASTERS
spirit:modelParameter.spirit:description: Number of masters on SPLB interface bus.

spirit:modelParameter.spirit:name: C_SPLB_MID_WIDTH
spirit:modelParameter.spirit:description: PLB master ID bus width, the value is log2(C_SPLB_NUM_MASTERS).

spirit:modelParameter.spirit:name: C_SPLB_NATIVE_DWIDTH
spirit:modelParameter.spirit:description: SPLB interface native data bus width.

spirit:modelParameter.spirit:name: C_MEM_INTERFACE
spirit:modelParameter.spirit:displayName: Use XMB or AXI4 to access memory

spirit:modelParameter.spirit:name: C_CONVERT_ENDIANESS
spirit:modelParameter.spirit:description: Convert endianness: no - endianness not converted (big endian); yes - endiannes converted (little endian).

spirit:modelParameter.spirit:name: C_BYTE_PER_PIXEL
spirit:modelParameter.spirit:description: In case Xylon DMA is used this parameter determines how many bytes form one image pixel.

spirit:modelParameter.spirit:name: C_ROW_STRIDE
spirit:modelParameter.spirit:description: Distance between the same colon pixels for adjacent rows in number of pixels.

spirit:modelParameter.spirit:name: C_USE_DMA
spirit:modelParameter.spirit:description: Enable logiSDHC DMA logic for transfering data from SD card to memory interface.

spirit:modelParameter.spirit:name: C_DMA_TYPE
spirit:modelParameter.spirit:description: Use Standard SD Specification DMA or Xylon type DMA optimized for graphic aplications.

spirit:modelParameter.spirit:name: C_SD_BASE_CLOCK_FREQ
spirit:modelParameter.spirit:displayName: Frequency of sd_base_clk signal input in MHz

spirit:component.spirit:description: logiSDHC is a Secure Digital (SD) card Host Controller IP core from the Xylon logicBRICKS IP core library. It is designed to transfer data from the system memory to the SD card's data bus, and vice versa. Implemented DMA mechanism enables a fast data transfer requiring minimum CPU activities. logiSDHC IP core is SD Host Controller Standard Specification Version 2.00 compliant. The IP supports non-DMA, standard DMA and Xylon's proprietary DMA transfers, and enables expansion of embedded systems based on the Xilinx FPGA devices by mass storage capabilities. logiSDHC IP supports ARM AMBA AXI4 bus, and supports Xilinx 7-series and all Xilinx FPGA families. The logiSDHC IP core makes it easy to add SD Card peripheral to the embedded (HOST) system. It provides a "programmed I/O" method for the Host Driver to transfer data using Buffer Data Port register. It also supports data transfer using DMA by implementing DMA algorithm defined in SD Host Controller Standard Specification Version 1.00, also called SDMA (Single Operation DMA). This algorithm defines the data transfer where only one SD command transaction is ecexuted per DMA operation. Memory access for DMA transfers are designed in such a way, that the required memory bandwidth is optimized ans kept as low as possible.

spirit:parameter.spirit:name: C_SD_BASE_CLOCK_FREQ
spirit:parameter.spirit:displayName: Frequency of sd_base_clk signal input in MHz

spirit:parameter.spirit:name: C_DMA_TYPE
spirit:parameter.spirit:description: Use Standard SD Specification DMA or Xylon type DMA optimized for graphic aplications.

spirit:parameter.spirit:name: C_USE_DMA
spirit:parameter.spirit:description: Enable logiSDHC DMA logic for transfering data from SD card to memory interface.

spirit:parameter.spirit:name: C_ROW_STRIDE
spirit:parameter.spirit:description: Distance between the same colon pixels for adjacent rows in number of pixels.

spirit:parameter.spirit:name: C_BYTE_PER_PIXEL
spirit:parameter.spirit:description: In case Xylon DMA is used this parameter determines how many bytes form one image pixel.

spirit:parameter.spirit:name: C_CONVERT_ENDIANESS
spirit:parameter.spirit:description: Convert endianness: no - endiannes not converted (big endian); yes - endianness converted (little endian).

spirit:parameter.spirit:displayName: Use XMB or AXI4 to access memory

spirit:parameter.spirit:name: C_SPLB_NATIVE_DWIDTH
spirit:parameter.spirit:description: SPLB interface native data bus width.

spirit:parameter.spirit:name: C_SPLB_MID_WIDTH
spirit:parameter.spirit:description: PLB master ID bus width, the value is log2(C_SPLB_NUM_MASTERS).

spirit:parameter.spirit:name: C_SPLB_NUM_MASTERS
spirit:parameter.spirit:description: Number of masters on SPLB interface bus.

spirit:parameter.spirit:name: C_REGS_HIGHADDR
spirit:parameter.spirit:description: Registers high address - use only if OPB or SPLB bus interface is implemented.

spirit:parameter.spirit:name: C_REGS_BASEADDR
